类 OAuth2PasswordAuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.security.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationToken
org.springframework.security.oauth2.server.authorization.authentication.OAuth2AuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken
org.springframework.security.oauth2.server.authorization.authentication.OAuth2PasswordAuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable, Principal, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication, org.springframework.security.core.CredentialsContainer
public class OAuth2PasswordAuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken extends org.springframework.security.oauth2.server.authorization.authentication.OAuth2AuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken
OAuth2 密码授权模式的认证令牌

用于在 OAuth2 授权服务器中处理密码模式（Resource Owner Password Credentials Grant）认证请求。 封装了用户名、密码、客户端认证信息及附加参数。

从以下版本开始:
2025/9/28
作者:
xuxiaowei, lishangbu
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • OAuth2PasswordAuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken

      public OAuth2PasswordAuthorizationGrantAuthenticationToken(String username, String password, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication clientPrincipal, @Nullable Set<String> scopes, Map<String,Object> additionalParameters)
      子类构造方法

      用于创建 OAuth2 密码授权模式的认证令牌实例

      参数:
      username - 资源拥有者的用户名
      password - 资源拥有者的密码
      clientPrincipal - 已认证的客户端信息
      scopes - 授权范围
      additionalParameters - 附加参数
